snippet: A judge dismissed much of a defamation suit earlier this month brought by an architect who said that anonymous and salacious postings about him online were written by a former lover.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court Judge Anil C Singh dismisses much of defamation suit brought by architect John B Wender, who claims that former lover Louise Silberling is the author of anonymous and withering postings about him online.
lead_paragraph: A judge dismissed much of a defamation suit earlier this month brought by an architect who said that anonymous and salacious postings about him online were written by a former lover.

headline.main: Judge Rules in Tale of a Soured Love Affair as Told on Anonymous Blogs
headline.print_headline: Judge Rules in Tale of a Soured Love Affair as Told on Anonymous Blogs
